scripts.init: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name alexandria-web-client --template-file ./infra.yaml --tags application=alexandria owner=cf --no-cli-pager
scripts.output-functions-stack: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name alexandria-functions-dev --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs' | jq 'map({(.ExportName): .OutputValue}) | add' > ./output.json
